name: Evalbot Racing
description:
Evalbot Racer is a classic "typing race" game where you can test your
typing speed (Words Per Minute) and compete with other players. 

All texts in game are related to software development.

You can play alone or wait in lobby to compete with 3 other people.

Game starts automatically when lobby is full (4 players)
or after timer goes down (30 seconds) even for 2 players in lobby.
